question:
[John] and his sister, [Linda], went to a sneak preview of the Avengers movie and loved it. [Scott] and his brother [Bruce] had a tie score. [Bruce] asked his sister, [Linda], to come up with a tie-breaker. [Joy] took her sister, [Melissa], out to dinner for her birthday. [Scott] likes to watch baseball with his brother. His name is [Bruce]. [Morgan] and her brother [Kenneth] enlisted in the army [Bruce] meet with his mom, [Melissa], for dinner at her favorite restaurant. [Morgan] and her brother [Brian] went to see a movie. [John] took his favorite son [Brian] to a baseball game where he caught a foul ball as a souvenir. [Kevin] took his son [Kenneth] to the park to feed the squirrels.
Question: How is [Joy] related to [Kevin]?
